message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still not able to go above $12,000 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
